mn21:8.4: ojāpaharaṇiyo → ojasāraṇiyo (s1-3) | ojaharaṇiyo (mr), chetvā → tacchetvā (bj, s1-3, pts1)
mn21:9.16: Na khvayye → na kho ayye (bj, pts1)
mn21:10.6: dhammaṃ mānento, dhammaṃ pūjento, dhammaṃ apacāyamāno → dhammaṃyeva sakkaronto dhammaṃ garukaronto dhammaṃ apacāyamāno (bj, s1-3, pts1)
mn21:12.4: vikhaṇeyya → khaṇeyya (bj, s1, pts1) | khaneyya (s2, s3)
